item.title: psutil 3.0, aka how I reimplemented ifconfig in Python
item.description: Here we are. It's been a long time since my last blog post and my last psutil release. The reason? I've been travelling! I mean... a lot. I've spent 3 months in Berlin, 3 weeks in Japan and 2 months in New York City. While I was there I finally â€¦
item.dc:creator: Giampaolo Rodola
